reviewText: Nice movies, especially for horse lovers and great for the whole family to watch . My favorite one is the movie about the Mule, it's funny but has a great meaning behind it!
I Watch with my granddaughter that loves horse movies
I bought this for my sister.  She loves watching horse movies.  She did enjoy this horse movie.

I loved it !! We have horses & grandchildren. Very surprised the DVD was so good! 4movies on on DVD & the first 3 were wonderful !!! 4th was western but poor quality very hazey. Rate it 6 star !!  Amazing for $3.99.
We really enjoyed these movies and think anyone who watches them will be happy they purchased this dvd.
